data.title: Brian Benben Height
data.meta_description: Brian Benben height is 5ft 6  or 167.6 cm tall. Discover more Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Leesheff85 said on 9/Dec/21

I'm assuming madeline is in a good thick pair of heels there. If not how can he possibly be 5ft 6?

Editor Rob

In heels she can look 2 or 3 inches taller than him, maybe she's the stronger 5ft 6 range

Tall In The Saddle said on 9/Apr/21

I just read this guy has been married to Madeleine Stowe since 1982 (bites knuckle!). Didn't have to DREAM ON there, did he?

Madeleine still looks great at age 62 yo. Sure, it looks as though she's has some work done but it's very good work. She actually still looks like Madeleine Stowe. It only gets creepy when they don't know when to stop having surgery. I haven't seen either of these guys in anything for a long time. DREAM ON was actually a very clever, entertaining series.

Rising - 174 cm said on 31/Jan/18

Dolph looks absolutely enormous with him and really in the whole film. Easily a head taller or more and Dolph has at least a 10" head.

Arch Stanton said on 15/Nov/12

In Dark Angel they frequently film Dolph and Benben at an angle to reduce the height difference appearance!!

Arch Stanton said on 15/Nov/12

I get a 5'5 range impression, 5'6" and change in shoes maybe.

Arch Stanton said on 15/Nov/12

Watching Dark Angel right now, Dolph looked almost a foot taller. Tiny guy.

leonari said on 27/Sep/12

Thanks Rob: I appreciate it!

leonari said on 26/Sep/12

This is Off Rob. I just went through hundreds of pics. He looks shorter. 167 max. Can you take a look at him? Do me this favor. Thanks.

Editor Rob

not sure about 167 but the 'change' bit might be a bit he's thrown, I'll put him flat 168.

Mr. R said on 29/Jul/08

saw him in The Dodger Stadium bathroom. This is pretty close.

patrick said on 13/Nov/07

I always found he looked less than 5'7 but it is probable he is. He looks short as if his jacket was always too long!

I find it's a shame his talent has only been recognized in "his" show "dream on". He is very good and "has the touch". Many vulgar much less able to act and be funny are abnormally more known than him. Stupid time!

Franco said on 30/Sep/07

i love his surname....BENBEN looooool :D

he is a weak 5'6.5 though, he is 168cm at most

Height Tracker said on 3/Nov/05

Did anyone see that movie he made with Dolph Lundgren? It was called "I come in Peace" or "Dark Angel" depending on where you bought it. In that movie, 6'5" Lundgren absolutely towered over Benben. 5'7" looks about right.
